Title: MassRenamer
Description: MassRenamer makes it easier to do mass file renaming for a directory. MassRenamer allows replacement (with wildcards), trimming start and end, capitalization, replacing underscores and dashes, and more. It also has an on the fly preview of changes. It is developed in C#/WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MassRenamer makes it easier to do mass file renaming for a directory. MassRenamer allows replacement (with wildcards), trimming start and end, capitalization, replacing underscores and dashes, and more. It also has an on the fly preview of changes. It is developed in C#/WPF.

Currently only does names, although I am looking into support the editing of music tags.
